function.description: Determines if the file or folder at the given `path` is hidden.

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The path that will be checked. This can be either a file or a folder, relative or absolute.

function.longDescription: Returns `true` if the path or folder is hidden or `false` otherwise.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Determine if the specified file or folder is hidden or not.
